mapper.insert: insert into SEC_WQM (ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, MONITOR_CONTENT, MONITOR_FREQUENCY, QA_PLAN_CATE, SAMP, CONFORMANCE, FROM_WDD, VALUATION_Q, VALUATION_S, VALUATION_E, VALUATION_H, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, DRAIN_OUTLET, QA_PLAN_VAL ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{monitorContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorFrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qaPlanCate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{samp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conformance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromWdd,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{valuationQ,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{valuationS,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{valuationE,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{valuationH,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drainOutlet,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{qaPlanVal,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: update SEC_WQM set SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERIAL_NUM = #{serialNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MONITOR_CONTENT = #{monitorContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_FREQUENCY = #{monitorFrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QA_PLAN_CATE = #{qaPlanCate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMP = #{samp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFORMANCE = #{conformance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_WDD = #{fromWdd,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, VALUATION_Q = #{valuationQ,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VALUATION_S = #{valuationS,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VALUATION_E = #{valuationE,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VALUATION_H = #{valuationH,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRAIN_OUTLET = #{drainOutlet,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, QA_PLAN_VAL = #{qaPlanVal,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, MONITOR_CONTENT, MONITOR_FREQUENCY, QA_PLAN_CATE, SAMP, CONFORMANCE, FROM_WDD, VALUATION_Q, VALUATION_S, VALUATION_E, VALUATION_H, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, DRAIN_OUTLET, QA_PLAN_VAL from SEC_WQM where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, MONITOR_CONTENT, MONITOR_FREQUENCY, QA_PLAN_CATE, SAMP, CONFORMANCE, FROM_WDD, VALUATION_Q, VALUATION_S, VALUATION_E, VALUATION_H, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, DRAIN_OUTLET, QA_PLAN_VAL from SEC_WQM
